觛字的基本解释

觛
dàn
圆形小酒器；古代礼器的一种：“寡人（楚昭王）朝饥馑时酒二觛，重裘而立。”

觛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dàn］
［《廣韻》多旱切，上旱，端。］
［《廣韻》徒旱切，上旱，定。］
［《廣韻》得按切，去翰，端。］
古代小的圆形酒器。

觛字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【角字部】　觛； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1141第05
【唐韻】徒旱切【集韻】【韻會】蕩旱切【正韻】徒亶切，?壇上聲。【說文】小觶也。　又【廣韻】多旱切【集韻】黨旱切，?音亶。【玉篇】小巵。【博雅】?、觛，巵也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?得案切，亶去聲。義同。

觛字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
觛字的起名意思

暂无。

Goblin
Basic explanation of words
Goblin
dàn
A small round drinking vessel; a kind of ancient ritual vessel: "The widow (king of Chu Zhao) drank two wines when he was hungry, and stood heavy."
Goblin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dàn］
["Guangyun" is often dry cut, up dry, end. ]
["Guangyun" is only dry cut, dry up, fixed. ]
["Guang Yun" must be cut, go to Han, end. ]
Ancient small round wine vessel.
Goblin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Jiao Zi Department] 　觛; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 1141 05
[Tang Yun] Cut dry only [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Cut dry dry [Zheng Yun] Cut dry, sound on the altar. [Said the text] Xiao Hu also.　 [Guang Yun] More dry cuts [Ji Yun] The party is dry cuts,? The sound is 亶. [Jade articles] Xiaomen. [Bo Ya]?, 巵, 巵 also.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] again? When the case is cut, I go to the sound. The same meaning.
